Uses of Interface
org.fluidity.testing.Simulator.Task

  • Packages that use Simulator.Task 
    Package Description
    org.fluidity.testing
    Utilities to simplify unit testing with EasyMock.

    • Uses of Simulator.Task in org.fluidity.testing

      Methods in org.fluidity.testing that return Simulator.Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Simulator.Task Simulator.Task.Concurrent.run(Simulator.MockObjects factory)
      Creates mock objects using the supplied factory, sets up expectations therewith, and then returns a task that will, in a separate thread, exercise the object under test to meet those expectations.
      Methods in org.fluidity.testing with parameters of type Simulator.Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Simulator.Threads.guarantee(long timeout, Simulator.Task task)
      Releases all threads created by Simulator.Threads.concurrent(Simulator.Task.Concurrent), invokes Simulator.guarantee(Simulator.Task), and then waits, with the given timeout, for all threads to complete.
      void Simulator.guarantee(Simulator.Task block)
      Invokes Simulator.replay(), executes the block, and then, regardless of whether the block throws an exception or not, invokes Simulator.verify().
      void Simulator.Threads.serial(Simulator.Task task)
      Executes in the calling thread the given task.
      void Simulator.test(Simulator.Task block)
      Executes the given block and returns whatever it returns.
      void Simulator.Threads.verify(long timeout, Simulator.Task task)
      Releases all threads created by Simulator.Threads.concurrent(Simulator.Task.Concurrent), invokes Simulator.verify(Simulator.Task), and then waits, for the given timeout, for all threads to complete.
      void Simulator.verify(Simulator.Task block)
      Invokes Simulator.replay(), executes the block, and then, unless the block throws an exception, invokes Simulator.verify().
